content:
The Mount Rushmore KOA is a great choice, and I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay there. It's always convenient to have amenities like a pool, playground, and convenience store right at your campsite.

And don't worry about not mentioning the length of your Yellowstone trip earlier - I'm just happy to chat with you about your adventures! A 5-day hiking trip in Yellowstone sounds like an amazing experience, and I'm sure you must have seen some incredible sights. Did you have a favorite hike or moment from that trip that stands out in your memory?
